attributes.action: Offering financial aid for people losing hours and jobs due to Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: Will help stop a financial crisis and a massive recession. Will support the public during a difficult time where families are already struggling. Sectors that people are unable to work from home should be supported by the employer or if not possible, the government.
attributes.background: Help with financial aid for people losing hours and jobs due to the virus outbreak. People working in tourism, hospitality, retail and self employed sectors who are unable to work from home and who are not being financially supported through their businesses during this massive loss in revenue.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
